methods_proposed.name: Moving Average Baseline
methods_proposed.implementation_code:
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.metrics import mean_absolute_error, mean_squared_error

# Load data
df = pd.read_parquet('/scratch/ziv_baretto/llmserve/final_code/output/stage3b_data_prep/prepared_PLAN-TSK-003.parquet')

# Identify target
target_col = [col for col in df.columns if 'Area-2024-25' in col][0]

# Split data
train_df = df[df['Season'] != '2024-25']
test_df = df[df['Season'] == '2024-25']

# Predict using baseline
train_avg = df['avg_area_prev_5_years'].mean()
predictions = [train_avg] * len(test_df)

# Calculate metrics
mae = mean_absolute_error(test_df[target_col], predictions)
rmse = mean_squared_error(test_df[target_col], predictions, squared=False)

print(f'Baseline MAE: {mae:.2f}, RMSE: {rmse:.2f}')

methods_proposed.name: Linear Regression
methods_proposed.implementation_code:
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression
from sklearn.metrics import mean_absolute_error, mean_squared_error

# Load data
df = pd.read_parquet('/scratch/ziv_baretto/llmserve/final_code/output/stage3b_data_prep/prepared_PLAN-TSK-003.parquet')

# Identify target
target_col = [col for col in df.columns if 'Area-2024-25' in col][0]

# Split data
train_df = df[df['Season'] != '2024-25']
test_df = df[df['Season'] == '2024-25']

# Prepare features
X_train = train_df.drop(columns=[target_col, 'Crop', 'Season'])
y_train = train_df[target_col]
X_test = test_df.drop(columns=[target_col, 'Crop', 'Season'])

# Train model
model = LinearRegression()
model.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Predict
predictions = model.predict(X_test)

# Calculate metrics
mae = mean_absolute_error(test_df[target_col], predictions)
rmse = mean_squared_error(test_df[target_col], predictions, squared=False)

print(f'Linear Regression MAE: {mae:.2f}, RMSE: {rmse:.2f}')

methods_proposed.name: Random Forest Regressor
methods_proposed.implementation_code:
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor
from sklearn.metrics import mean_absolute_error, mean_squared_error

# Load data
df = pd.read_parquet('/scratch/ziv_baretto/llmserve/final_code/output/stage3b_data_prep/prepared_PLAN-TSK-003.parquet')

# Identify target
target_col = [col for col in df.columns if 'Area-2024-25' in col][0]

# Split data
train_df = df[df['Season'] != '2024-25']
test_df = df[df['Season'] == '2024-25']

# Prepare features
X_train = train_df.drop(columns=[target_col, 'Crop', 'Season'])
y_train = train_df[target_col]
X_test = test_df.drop(columns=[target_col, 'Crop', 'Season'])

# Train model
model = RandomForestRegressor(n_estimators=100, random_state=42)
model.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Predict
predictions = model.predict(X_test)

# Calculate metrics
mae = mean_absolute_error(test_df[target_col], predictions)
rmse = mean_squared_error(test_df[target_col], predictions, squared=False)

print(f'Random Forest MAE: {mae:.2f}, RMSE: {rmse:.2f}')

data_preprocessing_steps: Split data by Season: train (Season != '2024-25'), test (Season == '2024-25')
Handle missing values (already imputed in Stage 3B)
